snippet: The Nevada State Athletic Commission fined and suspended Julio Cesar Chavez Jr. over a failed drug test before a fight last year in Las Vegas.
abstract: Nevada State Athletic Commission fines and suspends boxer Julio Cesar Chavez Jr over failed drug test before 2012 fight in Las Vegas; Chavez tested positive for marijuana.
lead_paragraph: The Nevada State Athletic Commission fined and suspended Julio Cesar Chavez Jr. over a failed drug test before a fight last year in Las Vegas.

headline.seo: Julio Cesar Chavez Jr. Penalized for Failed Drug Test
headline.main: Chavez Fined and Suspended for Failed Drug Test
